## About

Reach Panel is a web-based app that allows you to take full control of Reach {{ model }} receivers. It is the most user friendly app ever created for an RTK system and apart from numerous features has OTA updates that ensure that you constantly work with up-to-date version of the app. It works on any device with a browser and does not require Internet connection. Reach Panel is hosted on the Reach  {{ model }} itself and is accessed via Wi-Fi connection, which makes it compatible with Windows, OSX, Linux, Android and iOS.

## Getting Reach Panel app
